description:
testing: added Chatty() getter to know if tests are running in verbose mode.

I have few apps with internal logging, and I would like to mute its output
during the tests if '-test.v' flag is not set. Right now there's no way
to do it because testing does not export 'chatty' variable. This patch
defines public getter for this flag.

messages.text:
Seems fine for after Go 1; however, the documentation
surrounding the flag says verbose; this should be called
Verbose too, not Chatty.

Please remind us about this CL once Go 1 is out the door.

Thanks.
Russ

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

The APIs are frozen for Go 1. This is a minor change but it can wait until after Go 1 is released.

-rob
